Posts.Content: jamiesteward01 wrote: last several months I have had pain in my left breast. Was originally scheduled for a mammogram, they changed it to an ultrasound because of my age (32). During the ultrasound the lady started taking measuremnts of several dark spots within the outer quad. It did hurt while she was scanning. It took 3 days for the results. The doc that called me said I had dense tissue and Ihad several options. 1. Was to wait for 6 months to have another ultrasound to see if it grows or 2. Was to b set up with a surgical specialist.. So now Iam thinking they don't know what they are talking about, Iam worried and don't know where to go. The more stuff I read, the more I get worried. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: simply worried jamiesteward01 jamiesteward01
